{"id":1193350140,"question_id":72,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1709536127,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1193350140/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"44.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minDistance(String word1, String word2) {\n        int m = word1.length();\n        int n = word2.length();\n        int[][] dp = new int[m + 1][n + 1];\n\n        // Fill the DP table\n        for (int i = 0; i <= m; i++) {\n            for (int j = 0; j <= n; j++) {\n                // If one string is empty, the minimum edit distance is the length of the other string\n                if (i == 0) {\n                    dp[i][j] = j;\n                } else if (j == 0) {\n                    dp[i][j] = i;\n                } else if (word1.charAt(i - 1) == word2.charAt(j - 1)) {\n                    dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j - 1];\n                } else {\n                    dp[i][j] = 1 + Math.min(Math.min(dp[i - 1][j], dp[i][j - 1]), dp[i - 1][j - 1]);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        return dp[m][n];\n    }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
